      • getDebtOfUser

        public float getDebtOfUser(java.lang.String userId,
                           int userCount)
        Returns debts of single person. The debt is owed to the creator.
        Parameters:
        userCount - amount of users that share the costs including the creator
        Returns:
        debts of user specified in relation to the amount of users given. This will return a value for people that are not involved in the position!

      • getCredit

        public float getCredit(java.lang.String creditorId,
                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> involvedPeople)
        Calculates the amount of money the specified user has to retrieve from the involved people.
        Parameters:
        creditorId - debtor UID
        involvedPeople - list of involved people
        Returns:
        >0:amount, 0 if user is not the creator and therefore wont get money.

      • getBalanceMap

        Checks if all involvedPeople are excluded from payments.

        involvedPeople - list of people that are involved
        Returns:
        true is the position is closable, else false
